targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    d.device AS Device,
    s.location AS Location,
    s.latitude AS Latitude,
    s.longitude AS Longitude,
    s.manhole_distance AS "Manhole Distance",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level",
    CASE
        WHEN d.cover = 1 THEN 'FAIL !'
        WHEN d.cover = 0 THEN 'Normal'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
    END AS "Cover Status",
    CASE
        WHEN d.cover = 1 OR (s.manhole_distance - d.level) > 400 THEN 1
        ELSE 0
    END AS "Manhole Alert",
    d.timestamp AS Timestamp
FROM mpete_manhole.data d
JOIN mpete_manhole.setup s
    ON d.device = s.device
WHERE d.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(d2.timestamp)
    FROM mpete_manhole.data d2
    WHERE d2.device = d.device
)
AND d.device IN ($Device_MAP)
ORDER BY d.device ASC;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY d.device ASC) AS `No.`,
    d.device AS Device,
    s.location AS Location,
    s.latitude AS Latitude,
    s.longitude AS Longitude,
    s.manhole_distance,
    d.level AS "Ultrasonic Level",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level",
    -- Additional variables for Water Level
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Bar 1",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Bar 2",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Bar 3",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 1",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 2",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 3",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 4",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 5",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 6",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level Variable 7",
    d.cover AS "Cover Status",
    d.timestamp AS Timestamp
FROM mpete_manhole.data d
JOIN mpete_manhole.setup s
    ON d.device = s.device
WHERE d.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(d2.timestamp)
    FROM mpete_manhole.data d2
    WHERE d2.device = d.device
)
AND d.device IN ('$Device')
ORDER BY d.device DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY d.device ASC) AS `No.`,
    d.device AS Device,
    s.location AS Location,
    s.latitude AS Latitude,
    s.longitude AS Longitude,
    s.manhole_distance AS "Manhole Distance",
    d.level AS "Ultrasonic Level",
    (s.manhole_distance - d.level) AS "Water Level",
    d.cover AS "Cover Status",
    d.timestamp AS Timestamp
FROM mpete_manhole.data d
JOIN mpete_manhole.setup s
    ON d.device = s.device
WHERE d.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(d2.timestamp)
    FROM mpete_manhole.data d2
    WHERE d2.device = d.device
)
ORDER BY d.device ASC;

SELECT 
  device AS Device,
  location AS Location
FROM mpete_manhole.setup
WHERE device IN ('$Device')
ORDER BY device DESC
LIMIT 1;

list.definition:
SELECT 
  device
FROM mpete_manhole.data
ORDER BY device ASC
LIMIT 100000000;
